Uses of Package
com.KDH.platform

  • Classes in com.KDH.platform used by com.KDH.platform 
    Class and Description
    Address
    One address in an address book, including all the info about a member.
    AddressBook
    The Address of every known member of the KDH.
    Console
    A console window.
    Event
    This is a single hydrahashgraph event.
    FastCopyable
    An interface for classes that can be copied and serialized in a way specific to the KDH platform.
    FCDataInputStream
    A drop-in replacement for DataInputStream, which handles FastCopyable classes specially.
    FCDataOutputStream
    A drop-in replacement for DataOutputStream, which handles FastCopyable classes specially.
    Platform
    A KDH platform, which runs apps, and handles syncing and consensus.
    RandomExtended
    A class similar to Random, but with extra methods to clone it and add entropy, and without thread safety.
    Statistics
    This class collects and reports various statistics about network operation.
    KDHtate
    A KDH app is defined by creating two classes, one implementing KDHMain, and the other KDHtate, such that:

    KDHtate has a no-argument constructor (called by Platform) All KDHtate variables are thread-safe and private All KDHtate methods are synchronized KDHMain never modifies an object in KDHtate
    So, if KDHtate contains an array, and KDHMain gets it through a getter method, then the developer is responsible for making sure KDHMain never changes the contents of that array.
